text: Take a Shine To... is an album by Ella Koon, released in July 2011. It was released a year after her well-received 2010 mini-album Being. Hit songs include Ella’s first self-composed song “Reluctant to Part (依依)”, which is produced by hitmaker Chiu Tsang Hei with lyrics penned by Siu Hak. The album also contains RICOH camera CM song “A Moment of Interaction (一刻感應)” and the latest plug “Let Him Go (由他去)”. ==Track listing== *1. 由他去 (Let Him Go) *2. 依依 (Reluctant to Part) *3. 夜潛者 (Night Invader) *4. 一刻感應 (A Moment of Interaction - RICOH Camera 2011 CM Song) *5. 母忘你 (Unable to Forget) Category:2011 albums
title: Take a Shine To...
